msContents.summary:
It is a text of Manusmṛti, it contains total 12 chapters. Folios are flipped and folios at the end are not numbered. Numbers of the verses with the chapters are mentioned referring to the edition of the Manusmṛti available on http gretil sub uni-goettingen de. It seems to be written by multiple scribes and some folio are later added at some point to preserve the text. The old manuscript folio are damaged due to worms.
Before the front folio there is a note mentioning - Manusmṛti (12 Adhyāyas) Dharma , by Brigu Grantha 200 pages 12 lines.

msItem.incipit:
1v1 manum ekāgram āsīnam abhigamya maharṣayaḥ pratipūjya yathānyāyam idaṃ vacanam abruvan . bhagavan sarvavarṇānāṃ yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ antaraprabhavānāṃ ca dharmān no vaktum arhasi 1v 2 tvam eko hy asya sarvasya vidhānasya svayaṃbhuvaḥ acintyasyāprameyasya (deleted 4 syllables) kāryatattvārthavit prabho sa taiḥ pṛṣṭas tathā samyag amitaujā mahātmabhiḥ (1st chapter 1-4) 79v 1 ti viniścayaḥ eṣa daṇḍavidhiḥ prokto vākpāruṣyasya tattvataḥ ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi daṇḍapāruṣyanirṇayam yena yena yathāṅgena hiṃsyā 79v 2 c cec chreṣṭham antyajaḥ chettavyaṃ tadevāsya tan manor anuśāsanam pāṇim udyamya daṇḍaṃ vā pāṇicchedanam arhati (8th chapter 277-279)
133v 5 karma kāyenaiva ca kāyikam śarīrajaiḥ karmadoṣair yāti sthāvaratāṃ naraḥ vācikaiḥ pakṣimṛgatāṃ mānasair antyajātitām vāgdaṇḍo ’tha manodaṇḍaḥ kāyadaṇḍas 133v 6 tathaiva ca yasyaite nihitā buddhau tridaṇḍīti sa ucyate tridaṇḍam etan nikṣipya sarvabhūteṣu mānavaḥ kāmakrodhau tu saṃyamya tataḥ siddhiṃ niyacchati yo ’syātmanaḥ kārayitā taṃ kṣetra (12th chapter 11-12)
msItem.explicit: xv2 t . evaṃ yaḥ sarvabhūteṣu paśyaty ātmānam ātmanā sa sarvasamatām etya brahmābhyeti paraṃ padam ity etan mānavaṃ śāstraṃ bhṛguproktaṃ paṭhan dvijaḥ bhavaty ācāravān nityaṃ yatheṣṭāṃ prā xv3 pnuyād gatim . …
